text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum chimborazense is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Montúfar, R. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Solanum chimborazense". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46327A11048996. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46327A11048996.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
